column3: str
J'nasshym of the Brugaire Consortium seeks the services of a conveniently unoccupied adventurer.

J'nasshym of the Brugaire Consortium has tasked you with making a delivery─a gift parcel for services rendered─to the Dutiful Sisters of the Edelweiss. Head to the Sisters' “convent” found near Fisherman's Bottom, and hand the package directly to Lonwoerd.
You have delivered the package to Lonwoerd. Return to the Octant and speak with J'nasshym.

You return to J'nasshym and convey Lonwoerd's message. It would seem that the Dutiful Sisters are far more important to the continued well-being of Limsa Lominsa than their modest facade would indicate...
Deliver the package for the Dutiful Sisters to Lonwoerd.
Return to J'nasshym.

Excuse me, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>, but might you have a moment or two to spare? You seem the type who enjoys being accosted for menial tasks, and I require someone to make a delivery to the Dutiful Sisters of the Edelweiss.
I wouldn't be surprised if you hadn't heard of them─the Sisters prefer not to advertise their presence here in Limsa Lominsa.

They do, however, provide a rather <Emphasis>unique</Emphasis> service of which the Brugaire Consortium has recently been the beneficiary. I would have you deliver this package to their doorman, Lonwoerd, along with our profuse gratitude.
You'll find the Dutiful Sisters'...er, “convent” down near Fisherman's Bottom. Pray deliver the package to the doorman, along with the sincere gratitude of the Brugaire Consortium.
Aye, this's the Dutiful Sisters o' the Edelweiss─a house o' deep reflection an' meditation. So unless ye've proper business with us, ye can kindly bugger off.
Ho there, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. Ye lookin' to head inside?
...What's this, then? A parcel from the Brugaire Consortium, eh? Let's have a peek inside...
Oooh, walnut bread an' ginger cookies. ...An' a few o' them Bismarck finger sandwiches, too! Them Consortium culls know the right way to show appreciation!
Some o' them Sisters have unholy appetites, so I'd best save a few bites for meself afore I take this inside... Ahem. You let J'nasshym know we're always here should her boss have need of us again.
You've delivered the package as I requested? Very good. I shall pass on the Sisters' sentiments to my superior.
...Hm? What manner of services do the Dutiful Sisters provide?

Continue your stay in Limsa Lominsa, and you'll likely find out soon enough. In fact, if you're confident in your abilities─and comfortable with the <Emphasis>unconventional</Emphasis>─you might wish to approach them yourself...
I'm quite sure an adventurer of your stature has already glimpsed the truth behind the facade. For a business such as ours, their presence in the city is incredibly reassuring!
